Review Text Love this product. Was sad to know they won't be making it anymore 😔.
Tasty Energy Drink Featuring Vitamins B6 and B12
Review Title Drink sprays when you open it

Review Text The drink itself was fine. Tastes good and definitely gives me the energy through the day without making me too jittery, but every single one of them sprays when I open them. I have to open them in the sink to keep that pink liquid from getting everywhere. I don’t know why they do this because they’ve been sitting so they should have settled, but they do and it’s really annoying. I won’t be buying anymore because of this.
Tasty Energy Drink Featuring Vitamins B6 and B12

Review Text I love the flavor and the caffeine had a kick that I used for work and exercise. I never experienced crash. The only downside was the fact that I had to open it over a sink or trash bin to avoid a mess. Every time I opened it, it was spray into the air like a soda that's been shaken up.
Tasty Energy Drink Featuring Vitamins B6 and B12
